bosonic_jax.circuit.base.ZGate#

class bosonic_jax.circuit.base.ZGate(bcirc: BosonicCircuit, bqubit_indxs: Union[int, Tuple[int, ...]], params: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, ts: Optional[Array] = None, use_unitary: Optional[bool] = False)[source]#

Bases: BosonicGate

Methods

extend_gate

This can be used to extend a unitary gate or a hamiltonian.

get_H

QuTiP cython-backend compatible Hamiltonian list.

get_H_func

H(t), should be overriden as needed

get_U

Attributes

Allows the storage of H calculations.

U

U_qt

label

property H#

Allows the storage of H calculations. If use_unitary, then we forgo Hamiltonian simulation.

Returns:

first element is always a jnp.ndarray or 0 other elements are lists of the form [jnp.ndarray, str] E.g. [sigmaz, [sigmax, “cos(t)”]] [0, [sigmax, “cos(t)”]] [sigmaz] [0]

Return type:

self._H (list)

property H_func#

Wrapper around get_H_func function.

property U#

Allows the storage of U calculations.

extend_gate(Ms: List[Array])#

This can be used to extend a unitary gate or a hamiltonian.

get_H() → Optional[List][source]#

QuTiP cython-backend compatible Hamiltonian list.

Returns:

List of hamiltonians, used for simulation.

E.g. [sigmaz, [sigmax, “cos(t)”]]

get_H_func(t: float) → Array[source]#

H(t), should be overriden as needed

Parameters:

t (float) – time

Returns:

jnp.ndarray
